mapper.select: SELECT `b_seller_express_id`, `b_seller_id`, `b_seller_express_name`, `b_seller_express_status`, DATE_FORMAT(`b_seller_express_ctime`,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS `b_seller_express_ctime`, DATE_FORMAT(`b_seller_express_mtime`,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS `b_seller_express_mtime` FROM b_seller_express WHERE b_seller_express_id=#{b_seller_express_id}
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM b_seller_express WHERE b_seller_express_id IN
#{item}
